task_description:
# Create Finding Documentation Card

**Linear Issue:** [BUI-75](https://linear.app/builder-project/issue/BUI-75/create-finding-documentation-card)
**Priority:** High
**Status:** Backlog

## Description

Severity badges, photos - Ref: 22-finding-card.png

patterns.card_pattern: Use MUI Card + Emotion styled components. See Card.tsx for StyledCard with borderRadius: 12, hoverable prop
patterns.severity_badge: SeverityBadge component already exists in StatusBadge.tsx with correct colors for critical/high/medium/low
patterns.styling: Use Emotion's styled() for custom styling, follow MUI theme conventions

existing_implementations.description: Finding type already exists in types/index.ts with severity: FindingSeverity and photos: string[] (URLs)
existing_implementations.notes: Photos are stored as string[] URLs, not Photo objects. SeverityBadge component can be reused as-is.
